channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report E-2024080445
item.description:
Report E-2024080445

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-20T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-17
  • City: WILLIAMSTOWN
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 17, 2024, at 0822 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contacted by XPO personnel in Williamstown, West Virginia regarding the release of Klean Strip Lacquer Thinner (UN1263, Paint Related Material, Flammable Liquid, 3, II). Terminal personnel reported that 12 ounces were released from (1) 3.785-liter metal can due to being improperly loaded and impacted the trailer floor. Terminal personnel cleaned the release with absorbents then placed the spent absorbents along with the damaged can into a 10-gallon DM overpack, which was staged onsite as waste pending disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024080857
item.description:
Report X-2024080857

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-26
  • City: HUNTINGTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 26th during the PM sort a package was found to be leaking. The package contained one quart of UN1263 Paint, 3, in a limited quantity. The entire contents leaked due to lack of secondary closure. the package was placed into a salvage drum and sent for disposal.
